docs.snippet: The mails of the Africa reached this City last night, but we find nothing in our European files of sufficient interest to copy this morning.
docs.lead_paragraph: The mails of the Africa reached this City last night, but we find nothing in our European files of sufficient interest to copy this morning.

docs.snippet: By the arrival of the steamship Africa at Halifax, we receive advices from Europe two days later. She left Liverpool on the 31st ult., and Queenstown on the 1st inst.
docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the steamship Africa at Halifax, we receive advices from Europe two days later. She left Liverpool on the 31st ult., and Queenstown on the 1st inst.
